PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-16592008-09-05,  ,  ,  ,  HEALTH,  EC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisPCB REGULATIONS which will set specific deadlines for ending the use of PCBs in concentration at or above 50 mg/kg, eliminate all PCBs and PCB-containing equipment currently in storage and limit the period of time PCBs can be stored before being eliminated.
